body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Noteworthy, the premier music school. My name is Bryan Diaz. May I have your name, please?

Hi Bryan, my name is Gloria Reed.

Nice to meet you, Gloria! How can I assist you today?

I'm looking to find out more about your pricing, specifically for piano lessons.

Great! We offer various packages. Could you please confirm your email address so I can send you all the details?

Sure, it's gloria.reed@example.com.

Thank you, Gloria. Just to make sure I've got everything right, could you please spell out your phone number for me?

Yes, of course. It's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

Perfect, I've got that noted down. Our piano lesson packages start at one zero zero dollars per month. We'll email you a detailed breakdown. Does that sound good?

Yes, that sounds perfect! I'm relieved it's not more expensive.

I'm glad to hear that, Gloria. Thank you for reaching out! If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
